import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaTachometerAlt, FaStickyNote, FaBookOpen, FaFileAlt, FaUniversity, FaSignOutAlt, FaEdit, FaLayerGroup, } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Sidebar = () => { const baseStyle = 'flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-2.5 rounded-lg transition-all duration-200 ease-in-out hover:bg-blue-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-800'; const activeStyle = 'bg-blue-600 text-white dark:bg-gray-800 font-semibold shadow-sm'; const navSection = (title) => (

{title}

); return (
{/* Logo */}

ðŸŽ“ Academic Source

Admin Panel

{/* Navigation */}
{navSection('Main')} `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Dashboard {navSection('Manage Content')} `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Manage Notes `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Manage Syllabus `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Manage Papers `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Manage Courses `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Universities {navSection('Upload / Edit')} `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Add Dept/Course `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Add Resources `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Edit Departments `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Manage Books {/* Settings */}
`${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : ''}`}> Logout
); }; export default Sidebar;
